name: Galactic Company
description:
Galactic Company is an immersive sandbox and space simulation game where you can lead fleets and conquer space. Invade planets on foot, lead fleets through intense space battles, and manage your empire.

Skill and Progression System

Economy Simulation

Fleet Management

Switch Perspective with H. Faction Menu with J. I for inventory. U for quest menu. K for skill tree. B to switch to orbital controls. M to hide ui.

Follow on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GalacticCompany/
Subscribe on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/crypticis
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Crypticis
